docket_entries.description: COMPLAINT against BANGOR ASSISTED LIVING LLC, HAWTHORN RETIREMENT GROUP LLC with Jury Demand PAYMENT OF FILING FEE DUE WITHIN 48 HOURS. IF FILING FEE IS BEING PAID WITH A CREDIT CARD, COUNSEL ARE INSTRUCTED TO LOGIN TO CM/ECF AND DOCKET Case Opening Filing Fee Paid FOUND IN THE Complaints and Other Initiating Documents CATEGORY. CHECK PAYMENTS DUE WITHIN 48 HOURS., filed by CLAUDINE MCNAMARA. Fee due by 7/5/2016. (Service of Process Deadline 9/29/2016)(sfw) (Entered: 07/05/2016)

Summons Issued as to BANGOR ASSISTED LIVING LLC, HAWTHORN RETIREMENT GROUP LLC. Counsel shall print the embossed summons and effect service in the manner in accordance with Fed.R.Civ.P.4.
